solution.name: Company Wizard
solution.description:
Company Wizard will do the following:
- Link a contact to an existing company record.
- Create a company record if it does not exist and then link the contact.
- Bypass contacts with blank company or contact records.
- Provide a menu box showing how many company records were created, how many contacts were linked and how many were skipped.

solution.name: Durkin Calendar View Plus
solution.description: Calendar View Plus extends the power of Sage ACT! scheduling with multiple columns per day, extended print and font options, Gantt charts, and filter by contact, group or company.

solution.name: Durkin Contact List Plus
solution.description: Contact List Plus is a powerful plug-in that enhances Sage ACT!’s contact list view. You can edit, organize, and transform your contact list into a personalized color-coded data enriched view. It has advanced contact retrieval features such as Data Rules and Color Rules.

solution.name: Durkin Opportunity List Plus
solution.description: Opportunity List Plus addon for Sage ACT! - A powerful add-on tool for prospecting, tracking and closing sales. This add-on makes it easier to do more such as; track projects, attached activities, PDF invoices generate reports, export to excel. Your new custom tables are under the direct care of the Sage ACT! SQL database engine so they will be backed up, re-indexed and synched with all remote databases. Includes 25 starter templates.

solution.name: Durkin Task List Plus
solution.description: Task List Plus features include editing, colorization, calculations, organization, grouping, exporting, column formating and design in the task list view. Reschedule or reassign multiple activities, card view or table view, tag mode support, sort by multiple columns and more.

solution.name: OAK!Merge Advanced
solution.description: OAK!Merge Advanced is a data import and update utility that provides field-by-field merging of data into Sage ACT!. Its unlimited uses include conversions, updates, mass deletes, and clean-up of databases. Update sales info in Sage ACT! with mainframe data matching on customer number, update sales territory matching on zip code, import trade show or web leads, or update lead status from remote reps.

solution.name: Primary to Secondary Contact Wizard
solution.description: Use this plug-in to change a primary contact into a secondary contact. The tools allows you to optionally copy notes/histories to the main primary record. It also allows you to keep the original contact as a primary.

solution.name: QSalesData
solution.description: Having separate Sage ACT! and Quickbooks databases can be a major source of inefficiency and redundant work. The QSalesData Quickbooks link for Sage ACT! makes you more efficient.

solution.name: QuickStudy Guide for Sage ACT!
solution.description: Everything you want to know about Sage ACT! Pro and Sage ACT! Premium--from organizing contacts to customizing fields and screens to tracking sales opportunities--is available in this convenient guide. The QuickStudy Guide for Sage ACT! provides you with close to 600 pages of instruction, including more than 100 easy-to-follow lessons.

solution.name: Quosal for Sage ACT!
solution.description: Quosal™ for Sage ACT! will revolutionize your sales quote process. Save time and win more business with timely, accurate and attractive quotes and proposal documents.

solution.name: QuoteWerks
solution.description: QuoteWerks™ streamlines the process of creating sales quotes. Uses customer information from Sage ACT! on the road or in the office. Volume pricing, bundles, a configurator, and more.

solution.name: Remarkable Mail
solution.description: Remarkable Mail™ is the fastest, easiest-to-use direct mailing software for Sage ACT!. Now you can automatically send direct mail from Sage ACT! without leaving your desk – or licking a stamp!

solution.name: Sage E-Marketing for ACT! QuickStudy Guide
solution.description: Learn to use Sage E-marketing to send out simple follow-up messages or elaborate newsletters, create surveys, announce events, create calling lists for your sales staff... and much, much more.

solution.name: Scan IT
solution.description: Are you searching for a simple way to enter important business card information into Sage ACT!? Scan It for Sage ACT! lets you enter business card information directly into Sage ACT! using a CardScan business card scanner. Feature-rich and fully integrated with your Sage ACT! software, Scan It is the easiest, most accurate way to enter your business cards into Sage ACT! without manual data entry.

solution.name: Scan2CRM for Sage ACT!
solution.description: Scan2CRM for Sage ACT! is a fully integrated, add-on scanning system for Sage ACT!. It scans business cards and automatically inputs both their textual data and image into a new contact record.

solution.name: Search IT

solution.description: TopLine Alerts Professional sends customized email notifications to your inbox or PDA. This server-based program monitors activities, opportunities, backups and synchronization for all users in your Sage ACT! database. Stay informed. Save time. Take control.

solution.name: TopLine Dash Manager
solution.description: For the multi-user database, using the data of any selected user, TopLine Dash Manager allows managers to view and analyze performance of key performance indicators (KPIs), activities, histories, products, notes, and opportunities for all users.
